headline: Has Gartner (IT) Shares Fallen Too Far For The Current Valuation?
summary: If you are wondering whether Gartner's current share price still reflects its long term potential, or if expectations have moved too far, this article unpacks what the numbers say about value. Gartner shares last closed at US$209.61, with returns of a 9.6% decline over 7 days, an 11.6% decline over 30 days, an 11.6% decline year to date, a 61.4% decline over 1 year, a 38.7% decline over 3 years, and a 27.4% gain over 5 years, which may have shifted how investors think about both upside and...
